review: Pairing the remotes between the Fire TV and the stick is a bit of a challenge, but the customer service was great, and it works as intended. Only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that the voice remote should come with it, how much of a cost difference can it really be and I sdon't want to end up with so many remotes; and they should have designed a way to have the connection draw power from the TV rather than having the additional plug for power coming off the back of the stick, kind of defeats the purpose of the more streamline design.....

review: I love it, but my WiFi sucks. I probably need an amplifier. I won't buy another one for the other televisions until its compatible w/ HBO Now. I don't really care if the next generation is being designed for voice commands. Please update you apps, specifically HBO Now.

review: This was one of the best purchases I have made in a long time. It was extremely helpful to be able to access so many programs at the click of a button. I did like that when my internet was producing slow speeds, that it warned me ahead of time that the program I was watching may experience buffering in between.
